description.translate: A website to connect Peer Supporters to the disabled community

My areas of interest and expertise include; 20 years in the disability sector, disability rights/voice/leadership, played goalball and blind cricket, my family, children and young peoples rights, womenâ€™s issues.

children.text: I live in Hamilton with my two beautiful children and two cats.  I enjoy listening to music and would love to learn to the the guitar.  I also enjoy listening to audio books and my genre of interest are historical fiction, suspense and thrillers
I have a NZ Diploma in Business specialising in marketing, Bachelor in social work.
